biotools.summary: PlantiSMASH is a specialized extension of antiSMASH for the identification and analysis of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in plant genomes. It supports advanced plant-specific detection rules and features for comparative genomics, visualization, and more.

bioschemas.name: plantiSMASH
